content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace at position (61, -52)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (61.0, -52.0)) with current fuel of 7 coal and processing 9 copper-ore to produce 20 copper-plate.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that the furnace has sufficient fuel and inputs before starting the smelting process. Check the inventory of both the furnace and the agent to confirm that necessary resources are available.
